ComicInfo.Summary: As a fierce struggle between two foes comes to an end, demon princess Lilith finally manages to convince Areala that Seethe not only continues to live, but is a conduit to a greater evil that admittedly threatens Lilith's reign over the demonic underworld as well as all precious life on Earth. Their only hope to save what they both hold dear is for the two of them to infiltrate Seethe's sacred lair and prevent him from using the Scepter of the Crescent Moon to awaken an ancient militia that he seeks to utilize in order to further even greater evil deeds.
